Chapter 7: The Diffusion Equation / 7.2: Solution in One Space Dimension and Properties

Section 7.2.1: The Fundamental Solution, Heat Kernel, and Its Properties

namespace Chapter7variable (α t : ℝ)

The 1D heat kernel with diffusivity α : ℝα (assumed positive in theorems).

noncomputable def heatKernel (α : ℝ) (x t : ℝ) : ℝ := (1 / Real.sqrt (4 * Real.pi * α * t)) * Real.exp (-(x^2) / (4 * α * t))

Property 1: For each t > 0, Φ(x, t) is always strictly positive and integrates to one.

For α > 0 : Propα > 0 and t > 0 : Propt > 0, the heat kernel is strictly positive for every Unknown identifier `x`x.
